credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph Chazen
title: White Seaform Group
provenance: Acquired from donor, via Kate Elliot Contemporary Glass, Scottsdale, AZ, through the Charles Cowles Gallery, 1984.
description: Roughly circular large bowl form of clear and white glass. One of 11 vessel forms of various sizes, reminiscent of sea creatures or sea shell forms. Vessels can be arranged in a variety of combinations.
name: Vessel
